name: @tkr-context-kit/logging-config
description: Centralized configuration system for TKR logging components

scripts.validate: node -e "const {load} = require('./loader'); const config = load(); console.log('Configuration valid:', JSON.stringify(config, null, 2));"
scripts.env-export: node -e "const {getEnvironmentExport} = require('./loader'); const env = getEnvironmentExport(); Object.entries(env).forEach(([k,v]) => console.log(`export ${k}='${v}'`));"
